entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then clearing. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
